Marisa:MiniHakkero.NAME: Mini-Hakkero
Marisa:MiniHakkero.FLAVOR: A mini-Eight Trigram Furnace, a gift from Rinosuke when Marisa left her parents.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, gain #b1  #yCharge-up .

Marisa:BewitchedHakkero.NAME: Bewitched Hakkero
Marisa:BewitchedHakkero.FLAVOR: Its firepower is on a new level, but is it ok to use a bewitched tool?
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rMini-Hakkero . NL Whenever you play a card , gain #b1 #yCharge-up . NL gain 1 more if it is a #ySpark card.

Marisa:MagicArmor.NAME: Black Magic Shield
Marisa:MagicArmor.FLAVOR: In fact I don't know what the hell is this, but since the Designer put it in the Plan, here it is.-programmer
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse, gain 5 Block .

Marisa:MagicBroom.NAME: Magic Broom
Marisa:MagicBroom.FLAVOR: Marisa always travels on her flying broom.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b3 cards that cost 0, draw 1 card.

Marisa:AmpWand.NAME: Amplify Wand
Marisa:AmpWand.FLAVOR: A Wand seems to not be used often.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you activate 3 #yAmplify effects, gain [E]  [E] .

Marisa:RampagingMagicTools.NAME: Rampaging Magic Tool
Marisa:RampagingMagicTools.FLAVOR: It's been so long since anyone last used them. Who knows what could happen?
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. NL Apply a random debuff/buff ( #b2 #yFrail , #b2 #yWeak , #b2 #yVulnerable , #b3 #yPoison , #b8 #yCharge-up )to you at the start of each combat.

Marisa:ExperimentalFamiliar.NAME: Experimental Familiar
Marisa:ExperimentalFamiliar.FLAVOR: A Familiar that looks just like a shiny orb. Not very powerful, but it will surely help you a lot.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, add 1 #ySpark to your hand. NL At the start of combat, you can choose #b1 from #b3 random cards. It costs 0 this turn.

Marisa:BreadOfAWashokuLover.NAME: Bread Of A Washoku Lover
Marisa:BreadOfAWashokuLover.FLAVOR: "Can you remember how many slices of bread you have eaten until now?""Thirteen. I prefer Japanese food."
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal #b1 hp whenever you exhaust a #yStatus or a #yCurse. NL When triggered 13 times, you gain #b13 max HP, and this relic no longer works.

Marisa:SimpleLauncher.NAME: Simple Launcher
Marisa:SimpleLauncher.FLAVOR: A flashlight is a flashlight, no matter what it is called...
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce your #yCharge-up consumption threshold value from #b8 to #b6 .

Marisa:HandmadeGrimoire.NAME: Handmade Grimoire
Marisa:HandmadeGrimoire.FLAVOR: A notebook full of experiment records and magic material recipes; just how Marisa develops her Magics.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, for every 15 cards in your master deck, gain [E] and draw a card.

Marisa:ShroomBag.NAME: Shroom Bag
Marisa:ShroomBag.FLAVOR: All witches have an abnormal enthusiasm for mushrooms... Or is it just Marisa...?
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain 2 #yParasites. Parasites can now be played. Playing a #yParasite will heal #b2 HP and draw a card, then #yExhausts it.

Marisa:Cape.NAME: Cape
Marisa:Cape.FLAVOR: Marisa always takes whatever she wants, and this cape will surely help her doing so.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a shop room, earn some random combat rewards.
use(s) left. NL You can take the first merchandise in a shop for free.

Marisa:SproutingBranch.NAME: Sprouting Branch
Marisa:SproutingBranch.FLAVOR: The dead branch just comes. to life in Marisa's hand. How poetic.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b5 #yRegen.

Marisa:AmplifyWand.NAME: Amplification Wand
Marisa:AmplifyWand.FLAVOR: A wand that seems to not be used often.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you activate an #yAmplify effect, gain #b4 #yblock .

Marisa:CatCart.NAME: Cat Cart
Marisa:CatCart.FLAVOR: When you fall in battle, your loyal kitties will bring you back to life with this.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 charge when you climb a floor. When you would die, consume all charges and heal #g4 hp for each of them.

Marisa:BigShroomBag.NAME: Big Shroom Bag
Marisa:BigShroomBag.FLAVOR: A large version of shroom bag.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rShroom #rBag . NL Parasites can now be played. Playing a #yParasite will heal #b3 HP and draw #b2 card, then #yExhausts it.
